typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as long,
		PUBLICATION_ENTITY_NAME as string,
		SECTION_NAME as string,
		PAGE_NUMBER as integer,
		TOTAL_PAGES as integer,
		SECTION_NUMBER as integer,
		SPOT_NUMBER as integer,
		SPOT_TYPE as string,
		PAGE as string,
		SECTION as string,
		SPOT as string,
		SPOT_POSITION as string,
		VEHICLE_OFFER_DURATION as string,
		SECTION_FULL_DESCRIPTION as string,
		SPOT_FULL_DESCRIPTION as string,
		SPOT_POSITION_FULL_DESCRIPTION as string,
		PUBLICATION_VERSION as integer,
		MAIN_AD_DESCRIPTION as string,
		AD_VARIETIES as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADVehicleParquetSCD
source(output(
		Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Publication_Entity_Name as string,
		Current_Publication_Entity_Name as string,
		Section_Name as string,
		Current_Section_Name as string,
		Page_Number as integer,
		Current_Page_Number as integer,
		Total_Pages as integer,
		Current_Total_Pages as integer,
		Section_Number as integer,
		Current_Section_Number as integer,
		Spot_Number as integer,
		Current_Spot_Number as integer,
		Spot_Type as string,
		Current_Spot_Type as string,
		Page as string,
		Current_Page as string,
		Section as string,
		Current_Section as string,
		Spot as string,
		Current_Spot as string,
		Spot_Position as string,
		Current_Spot_Position as string,
		Vehicle_Offer_Duration as string,
		Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration as string,
		Section_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Section_Full_Description as string,
		Spot_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Spot_Full_Description as string,
		Spot_Position_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description as string,
		Publication_Version as integer,
		Current_Publication_Version as integer,
		Main_Ad_Description as string,
		Current_Main_Ad_Description as string,
		Ad_Varieties as string,
		Current_Ad_Varieties as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as integer,
		Eff_Start_Dt as date,
		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ADVehicleDIM
ADVehicleDIM select(mapColumn(
		TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id = Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id,
		TGT_ID = ID,
		TGT_Publication_Entity_Name = Publication_Entity_Name,
		TGT_Current_Publication_Entity_Name = Current_Publication_Entity_Name,
		TGT_Section_Name = Section_Name,
		TGT_Current_Section_Name = Current_Section_Name,
		TGT_Page_Number = Page_Number,
		TGT_Current_Page_Number = Current_Page_Number,
		TGT_Total_Pages = Total_Pages,
		TGT_Current_Total_Pages = Current_Total_Pages,
		TGT_Section_Number = Section_Number,
		TGT_Current_Section_Number = Current_Section_Number,
		TGT_Spot_Number = Spot_Number,
		TGT_Current_Spot_Number = Current_Spot_Number,
		TGT_Spot_Type = Spot_Type,
		TGT_Current_Spot_Type = Current_Spot_Type,
		TGT_Page = Page,
		TGT_Current_Page = Current_Page,
		TGT_Section = Section,
		TGT_Current_Section = Current_Section,
		TGT_Spot = Spot,
		TGT_Current_Spot = Current_Spot,
		TGT_Spot_Position = Spot_Position,
		TGT_Current_Spot_Position = Current_Spot_Position,
		TGT_Vehicle_Offer_Duration = Vehicle_Offer_Duration,
		TGT_Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration = Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration,
		TGT_Section_Full_Description = Section_Full_Description,
		TGT_Current_Section_Full_Description = Current_Section_Full_Description,
		TGT_Spot_Full_Description = Spot_Full_Description,
		TGT_Current_Spot_Full_Description = Current_Spot_Full_Description,
		TGT_Spot_Position_Full_Description = Spot_Position_Full_Description,
		TGT_Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description = Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description,
		TGT_Publication_Version = Publication_Version,
		TGT_Current_Publication_Version = Current_Publication_Version,
		TGT_Main_Ad_Description = Main_Ad_Description,
		TGT_Current_Main_Ad_Description = Current_Main_Ad_Description,
		TGT_Ad_Varieties = Ad_Varieties,
		TGT_Current_Ad_Varieties = Current_Ad_Varieties,
		TGT_Last_Changed = Last_Changed,
		TGT_Last_Dml = Last_Dml,
		TGT_Eff_Start_Dt = Eff_Start_Dt,
		TGT_Eff_End_Dt = Eff_End_Dt,
		TGT_IsActive = IsActive,
		TGT_Crc_Val = Crc_Val
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTGT
DerivedColumn4 derive(IsActive = 1,
		EFF_START_DT = toDate('1900-01-01'),
		EFF_END_DT = toDate('9999-12-31'),
		CRCVAL = case(isNull(ID),TGT_Crc_Val,md5(PUBLICATION_ENTITY_NAME,SECTION_NAME,PAGE_NUMBER,TOTAL_PAGES,SECTION_NUMBER,SPOT_NUMBER,SPOT_TYPE,PAGE,SECTION,SPOT,SPOT_POSITION,VEHICLE_OFFER_DURATION,SECTION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,SPOT_FULL_DESCRIPTION,SPOT_POSITION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,PUBLICATION_VERSION,MAIN_AD_DESCRIPTION,AD_VARIETIES,LAST_DML))) ~> DerivedColumnCRCVAL
SelectTGT aggregate(MAXVAL = max(TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id)) ~> AGGMAXVAL
ADVehicleParquetSCD, AGGMAXVAL join(1 == 1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSRCMaxTGTKey
DerivedColumnCRCVAL split((isNull(TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id)  && LAST_DML>=0) || (not(isNull(TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id)) && CRCVAL != TGT_Crc_Val  && IsActive==1 ),
	(not(isNull(TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id)) && CRCVAL == TGT_Crc_Val) && IsActive == 1,
	not(isNull(TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id)) && LAST_DML < 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@(SurrogateKey, NoSurrogateKey, Delete)
FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@SurrogateKey keyGenerate(output(SurrogateKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> CreateSurrogateKey
DerivedColumnSurrogateKey split(isNull(TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id)  && LAST_DML>=0,
	not(isNull(TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id)) && CRCVAL != TGT_Crc_Val  && LAST_DML>=0 && TGT_IsActive == 1,
	not(isNull(TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id)) && CRCVAL != TGT_Crc_Val  && LAST_DML>=0 && TGT_IsActive == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewChange@(NewRecords, SCD2, SCDExpiry)
CreateSurrogateKey derive(out_SurrogateKey = toInteger(SurrogateKey) + iifNull(MAXVAL,0,MAXVAL)) ~> DerivedColumnSurrogateKey
NewChange@SCD2 derive(expiry_EFF_END_DATE = currentDate()) ~> Expiry
FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@Delete derive(delete_EFF_END_DATE = currentDate(),
		delete_inactive = 0) ~> DerivedColumnDelete
JoinSRCMaxTGTKey, SelectTGT join(ID == TGT_ID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSrcTgt
NewChange@SCD2 derive(scd_EFF_START_DT = currentDate()) ~> DerivedSCD2
Expiry, NewChange@SCDExpiry union(byName: true)~> UnionExpiry
UnionExpiry derive(final_EFF_END_DT = case(TGT_IsActive == 0,TGT_Eff_End_Dt,expiry_EFF_END_DATE),
		Inactive = 0) ~> DerivedColumn2
FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@NoSurrogateKey derive(del_EFF_END_DATE = case(LAST_DML<0 && TGT_Eff_End_Dt < currentDate(),TGT_Eff_End_Dt,
LAST_DML<0 && TGT_Eff_End_Dt > currentDate(),currentDate()
, TGT_Eff_End_Dt),
		del_inactive = case(LAST_DML<0,0,TGT_IsActive),
		del_LAST_DML = case(LAST_DML<0,LAST_DML,TGT_Last_Dml)) ~> DerivedColumn3
JoinSrcTgt sort(asc(ID, false)) ~> SortSrcID
SortSrcID derive(LAST_DML = 0,
		LAST_CHANGED = toString(currentDate(),'MM/dd/yyyy')) ~> DerivedColumn4
NewChange@NewRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Publication_Entity_Name as string,
		Current_Publication_Entity_Name as string,
		Section_Name as string,
		Current_Section_Name as string,
		Page_Number as integer,
		Current_Page_Number as integer,
		Total_Pages as integer,
		Current_Total_Pages as integer,
		Section_Number as integer,
		Current_Section_Number as integer,
		Spot_Number as integer,
		Current_Spot_Number as integer,
		Spot_Type as string,
		Current_Spot_Type as string,
		Page as string,
		Current_Page as string,
		Section as string,
		Current_Section as string,
		Spot as string,
		Current_Spot as string,
		Spot_Position as string,
		Current_Spot_Position as string,
		Vehicle_Offer_Duration as string,
		Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration as string,
		Section_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Section_Full_Description as string,
		Spot_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Spot_Full_Description as string,
		Spot_Position_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description as string,
		Publication_Version as integer,
		Current_Publication_Version as integer,
		Main_Ad_Description as string,
		Current_Main_Ad_Description as string,
		Ad_Varieties as string,
		Current_Ad_Varieties as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as integer,
		Eff_Start_Dt as date,
		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['AdVehicleDIM_New.parquet'],
	saveOrder: 0,
	mapColumn(
		Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id = out_SurrogateKey,
		ID,
		Publication_Entity_Name = PUBLICATION_ENTITY_NAME,
		Current_Publication_Entity_Name = PUBLICATION_ENTITY_NAME,
		Section_Name = SECTION_NAME,
		Current_Section_Name = SECTION_NAME,
		Page_Number = PAGE_NUMBER,
		Current_Page_Number = PAGE_NUMBER,
		Total_Pages = TOTAL_PAGES,
		Current_Total_Pages = TOTAL_PAGES,
		Section_Number = SECTION_NUMBER,
		Current_Section_Number = SECTION_NUMBER,
		Spot_Number = SPOT_NUMBER,
		Current_Spot_Number = SPOT_NUMBER,
		Spot_Type = SPOT_TYPE,
		Current_Spot_Type = SPOT_TYPE,
		Page = PAGE,
		Current_Page = PAGE,
		Section = SECTION,
		Current_Section = SECTION,
		Spot = SPOT,
		Current_Spot = SPOT,
		Spot_Position = SPOT_POSITION,
		Current_Spot_Position = SPOT_POSITION,
		Vehicle_Offer_Duration = VEHICLE_OFFER_DURATION,
		Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration = VEHICLE_OFFER_DURATION,
		Section_Full_Description = SECTION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Current_Section_Full_Description = SECTION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Spot_Full_Description = SPOT_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Current_Spot_Full_Description = SPOT_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Spot_Position_Full_Description = SPOT_POSITION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description = SPOT_POSITION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Publication_Version = PUBLICATION_VERSION,
		Current_Publication_Version = PUBLICATION_VERSION,
		Main_Ad_Description = MAIN_AD_DESCRIPTION,
		Current_Main_Ad_Description = MAIN_AD_DESCRIPTION,
		Ad_Varieties = AD_VARIETIES,
		Current_Ad_Varieties = AD_VARIETIES,
		Last_Changed = LAST_CHANGED,
		Last_Dml = LAST_DML,
		Eff_Start_Dt = EFF_START_DT,
		Eff_End_Dt = EFF_END_DT,
		IsActive,
		Crc_Val = CRCVAL
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkNew
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Publication_Entity_Name as string,
		Current_Publication_Entity_Name as string,
		Section_Name as string,
		Current_Section_Name as string,
		Page_Number as integer,
		Current_Page_Number as integer,
		Total_Pages as integer,
		Current_Total_Pages as integer,
		Section_Number as integer,
		Current_Section_Number as integer,
		Spot_Number as integer,
		Current_Spot_Number as integer,
		Spot_Type as string,
		Current_Spot_Type as string,
		Page as string,
		Current_Page as string,
		Section as string,
		Current_Section as string,
		Spot as string,
		Current_Spot as string,
		Spot_Position as string,
		Current_Spot_Position as string,
		Vehicle_Offer_Duration as string,
		Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration as string,
		Section_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Section_Full_Description as string,
		Spot_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Spot_Full_Description as string,
		Spot_Position_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description as string,
		Publication_Version as integer,
		Current_Publication_Version as integer,
		Main_Ad_Description as string,
		Current_Main_Ad_Description as string,
		Ad_Varieties as string,
		Current_Ad_Varieties as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as integer,
		Eff_Start_Dt as date,
		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['AdVehicleDIMChangeExpiry.parquet'],
	saveOrder: 0,
	mapColumn(
		Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id = TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id,
		ID = TGT_ID,
		Publication_Entity_Name = TGT_Publication_Entity_Name,
		Current_Publication_Entity_Name = PUBLICATION_ENTITY_NAME,
		Section_Name = TGT_Section_Name,
		Current_Section_Name = SECTION_NAME,
		Page_Number = TGT_Page_Number,
		Current_Page_Number = PAGE_NUMBER,
		Total_Pages = TGT_Total_Pages,
		Current_Total_Pages = TOTAL_PAGES,
		Section_Number = TGT_Section_Number,
		Current_Section_Number = SECTION_NUMBER,
		Spot_Number = TGT_Spot_Number,
		Current_Spot_Number = SPOT_NUMBER,
		Spot_Type = TGT_Spot_Type,
		Current_Spot_Type = SPOT_TYPE,
		Page = TGT_Page,
		Current_Page = PAGE,
		Section = TGT_Section,
		Current_Section = SECTION,
		Spot = TGT_Spot,
		Current_Spot = SPOT,
		Spot_Position = TGT_Spot_Position,
		Current_Spot_Position = SPOT_POSITION,
		Vehicle_Offer_Duration = TGT_Vehicle_Offer_Duration,
		Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration = VEHICLE_OFFER_DURATION,
		Section_Full_Description = TGT_Section_Full_Description,
		Current_Section_Full_Description = SECTION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Spot_Full_Description = TGT_Spot_Full_Description,
		Current_Spot_Full_Description = SPOT_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Spot_Position_Full_Description = TGT_Spot_Position_Full_Description,
		Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description = SPOT_POSITION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Publication_Version = TGT_Publication_Version,
		Current_Publication_Version = PUBLICATION_VERSION,
		Main_Ad_Description = TGT_Main_Ad_Description,
		Current_Main_Ad_Description = MAIN_AD_DESCRIPTION,
		Ad_Varieties = TGT_Ad_Varieties,
		Current_Ad_Varieties = AD_VARIETIES,
		Last_Changed = TGT_Last_Changed,
		Last_Dml = TGT_Last_Dml,
		Eff_Start_Dt = TGT_Eff_Start_Dt,
		Eff_End_Dt = final_EFF_END_DT,
		IsActive = Inactive,
		Crc_Val = TGT_Crc_Val
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkExpiry
DerivedColumn3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Publication_Entity_Name as string,
		Current_Publication_Entity_Name as string,
		Section_Name as string,
		Current_Section_Name as string,
		Page_Number as integer,
		Current_Page_Number as integer,
		Total_Pages as integer,
		Current_Total_Pages as integer,
		Section_Number as integer,
		Current_Section_Number as integer,
		Spot_Number as integer,
		Current_Spot_Number as integer,

		Current_Spot_Type as string,
		Page as string,
		Current_Page as string,
		Section as string,
		Current_Section as string,
		Spot as string,
		Current_Spot as string,
		Spot_Position as string,
		Current_Spot_Position as string,
		Vehicle_Offer_Duration as string,
		Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration as string,
		Section_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Section_Full_Description as string,
		Spot_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Spot_Full_Description as string,
		Spot_Position_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description as string,
		Publication_Version as integer,
		Current_Publication_Version as integer,
		Main_Ad_Description as string,
		Current_Main_Ad_Description as string,
		Ad_Varieties as string,
		Current_Ad_Varieties as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as integer,
		Eff_Start_Dt as date,
		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['AdVehicleDIMNoChange.parquet'],
	saveOrder: 0,
	mapColumn(
		Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id = TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id,
		ID = TGT_ID,
		Publication_Entity_Name = TGT_Publication_Entity_Name,
		Current_Publication_Entity_Name = TGT_Current_Publication_Entity_Name,
		Section_Name = TGT_Section_Name,
		Current_Section_Name = TGT_Current_Section_Name,
		Page_Number = TGT_Page_Number,
		Current_Page_Number = TGT_Current_Page_Number,
		Total_Pages = TGT_Total_Pages,
		Current_Total_Pages = TGT_Current_Total_Pages,
		Section_Number = TGT_Section_Number,
		Current_Section_Number = TGT_Current_Section_Number,
		Spot_Number = TGT_Spot_Number,
		Current_Spot_Number = TGT_Current_Spot_Number,
		Spot_Type = TGT_Spot_Type,
		Current_Spot_Type = TGT_Current_Spot_Type,
		Page = TGT_Page,
		Current_Page = TGT_Current_Page,
		Section = TGT_Section,
		Current_Section = TGT_Current_Section,
		Spot = TGT_Spot,
		Current_Spot = TGT_Current_Spot,
		Spot_Position = TGT_Spot_Position,
		Current_Spot_Position = TGT_Current_Spot_Position,
		Vehicle_Offer_Duration = TGT_Vehicle_Offer_Duration,
		Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration = TGT_Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration,
		Section_Full_Description = TGT_Section_Full_Description,
		Current_Section_Full_Description = TGT_Current_Section_Full_Description,
		Spot_Full_Description = TGT_Spot_Full_Description,
		Current_Spot_Full_Description = TGT_Current_Spot_Full_Description,
		Spot_Position_Full_Description = TGT_Spot_Position_Full_Description,
		Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description = TGT_Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description,
		Publication_Version = TGT_Publication_Version,
		Current_Publication_Version = TGT_Current_Publication_Version,
		Main_Ad_Description = TGT_Main_Ad_Description,
		Current_Main_Ad_Description = TGT_Current_Main_Ad_Description,
		Ad_Varieties = TGT_Ad_Varieties,
		Current_Ad_Varieties = TGT_Current_Ad_Varieties,
		Last_Changed = TGT_Last_Changed,
		Last_Dml = del_LAST_DML,
		Eff_Start_Dt = TGT_Eff_Start_Dt,
		Eff_End_Dt = del_EFF_END_DATE,
		IsActive = del_inactive,
		Crc_Val = TGT_Crc_Val
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkNoChange
DerivedColumnDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Publication_Entity_Name as string,
		Current_Publication_Entity_Name as string,
		Section_Name as string,
		Current_Section_Name as string,
		Page_Number as integer,
		Current_Page_Number as integer,
		Total_Pages as integer,
		Current_Total_Pages as integer,
		Section_Number as integer,
		Current_Section_Number as integer,
		Spot_Number as integer,
		Current_Spot_Number as integer,
		Spot_Type as string,
		Current_Spot_Type as string,
		Page as string,
		Current_Page as string,
		Section as string,
		Current_Section as string,
		Spot as string,
		Current_Spot as string,
		Spot_Position as string,
		Current_Spot_Position as string,
		Vehicle_Offer_Duration as string,
		Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration as string,
		Section_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Section_Full_Description as string,
		Spot_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Spot_Full_Description as string,
		Spot_Position_Full_Description as string,
		Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description as string,
		Publication_Version as integer,
		Current_Publication_Version as integer,
		Main_Ad_Description as string,
		Current_Main_Ad_Description as string,
		Ad_Varieties as string,
		Current_Ad_Varieties as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as integer,
		Eff_Start_Dt as date,
		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['AdVehicleDIMDelete.parquet'],
	saveOrder: 0,
	mapColumn(
		Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id = TGT_Ad_Vehicle_Surrogate_Id,
		ID,
		Publication_Entity_Name = PUBLICATION_ENTITY_NAME,
		Current_Publication_Entity_Name = PUBLICATION_ENTITY_NAME,
		Section_Name = SECTION_NAME,
		Current_Section_Name = SECTION_NAME,
		Page_Number = PAGE_NUMBER,
		Current_Page_Number = PAGE_NUMBER,
		Total_Pages = TOTAL_PAGES,
		Current_Total_Pages = TOTAL_PAGES,
		Section_Number = SECTION_NUMBER,
		Current_Section_Number = SECTION_NUMBER,
		Spot_Number = SPOT_NUMBER,
		Current_Spot_Number = SPOT_NUMBER,
		Spot_Type = SPOT_TYPE,
		Current_Spot_Type = SPOT_TYPE,
		Page = PAGE,
		Current_Page = PAGE,
		Section = SECTION,
		Current_Section = SECTION,
		Spot = SPOT,
		Current_Spot = SPOT,
		Spot_Position = SPOT_POSITION,
		Current_Spot_Position = SPOT_POSITION,
		Vehicle_Offer_Duration = VEHICLE_OFFER_DURATION,
		Current_Vehicle_Offer_Duration = VEHICLE_OFFER_DURATION,
		Section_Full_Description = SECTION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Current_Section_Full_Description = SECTION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Spot_Full_Description = SPOT_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Current_Spot_Full_Description = SPOT_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Spot_Position_Full_Description = SPOT_POSITION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Current_Spot_Position_Full_Description = SPOT_POSITION_FULL_DESCRIPTION,
		Publication_Version = PUBLICATION_VERSION,
		Current_Publication_Version = PUBLICATION_VERSION,
		Main_Ad_Description = MAIN_AD_DESCRIPTION,
		Current_Main_Ad_Description = MAIN_AD_DESCRIPTION,
		Ad_Varieties = AD_VARIETIES,
		Current_Ad_Varieties = AD_VARIETIES,
		Last_Changed = LAST_CHANGED,
		Last_Dml = LAST_DML,
